text: Of Time, Tombs and Treasures is a 1977 American short documentary film about the discovery the Tomb of the Tutankamun. Produced by James R. Messenger, the film was nominated for an Academy Award for Best Documentary Short. ==References== ==External links== * Category:1977 films Category:1977 documentary films Category:1977 short films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American documentary films Category:American short films Category:Documentary films about historical events Category:Valley of the Kings Category:Films shot in Egypt Category:Archaeology in popular culture Category:Tutankhamun
title: Of Time, Tombs and Treasures
